Function reference

All functions

PB2002
Global set of present plate boundaries on the Earth (PB2002)
PlateTectonicStressR
library(PlateTectonicStressR)
PositionCenterSpoke
Centrically aligned geom_spoke marker
abs_vel()
Absolute plate velocity
angle_vectors()
Angle between two vectors
cartesian_to_geographical()
Cartesian to geographical coordinates
circular_quasi_interquartile_range()
Quasi Interquartile Range on a Circle
circular_quasi_median()
Quasi Median on a Circle
circular_quasi_quartile()
Quasi Quartile on a Circle
deviation_norm()
Normalize angle between two directions
eulerpole_greatcircles()
Draws great-circles of Euler pole
eulerpole_loxodromes()
Draws loxodromes directed towards an Euler pole
eulerpole_smallcircles()
Draws small-circles around Euler pole
geographical_to_cartesian()
Geographical to cartesian coordinates
get_azimuth()
Azimuth between two points
greatcircle_dummy()
Great circle grid dummy
longitude_modulo()
Longitude correction
loxodrome_dummy()
Loxodrome dummy
misfit_shmax()
Deviation of observed and predicted directions of SHmax
model_shmax()
Modeling directions of maximum horizontal stress
norm_chi2()
Normalized chi-square test
nuvel1
Global model of current plate motions (NUVEL-1)
quantise_wsm_quality()
Quantise World Stress Map quality ranking
rotate_lines()
Rotate lines
rotation_matrix()
Rotation matrix
smallcircle_dummy()
Small circle grid dummy
wrap_dateline()
Wrap Spatial object at dateline
wsm2016
World Stress Map
